item.title: Lightning Payment Pathfinding for Reliability
item.description: Introduction I’m Joost Jager. I work for Lightning Labs. At Lightning Labs, I’m a software engineer, and my main focus is on LND. Over the last month, I spent quite some time to improve pathfinding in LND. In this talk, I would like to explain how we optimize pathfinding for the reliability of paths. Lightning payment pathfinding So we’re looking for a path. That’s clear. But what do we optimize the path for?
